bibl.title: Washtub from the Palace of Ioannes in Dongola.
bibl.note: Deposit of objects discarded from the palace, found in the 2008 season. It consists mainly of pottery and fragments of a broken tub of considerable size, cut from a single block of sandstone.

bibl.title: Études et Travaux (Studia i Prace). Travaux du Centre d'archéologie méditerranéenne de l'Académie Polonaise des Sciences

bibl.seg: Włodzimierz Godlewski, Washtub from the Palace of Ioannes in Dongola.
Deposit of objects discarded from the palace, found in the 2008 season. It consists mainly of pottery and fragments of a broken tub of considerable size, cut from a single block of sandstone.
